column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=IN :
#Text=That ’s like saying to an organization set up to help the homeless , “ Is it true you are more concerned with the homeless than people with mansions ? ” Yes .
#Text=Obviously we are set up to help the non-humans who do n’t have anybody speaking for them because there are countless organizations set up to help humans .
#Text=Humans can often invariably help themselves .

#Text=They may have lower wages than they should or be disrespected ; they may have all sorts of hardships , but they are not labeled chops or nuggets and doomed from the moment they are born to be cut up without anesthesia or used as test tubes .
#Text=Once in a while you find the military used people against their will , and in the old days orphans were used in Tuberculosis experiments here in New York .
#Text=But it does n’t happen as a matter of being born getting a label as something you can cut up and deprive of life just for a fleeting pleasure .
#Text=DS : Jim Young , one of the lab people with the really red ears —
#Text=IN :
#Text=Oh , yeah , that was great !
#Text=It was fascinating , something like a science experiment !
#Text=Like radioactive ears .
#Text=DS : Everyone was looking at them .
#Text=One of the things he had said was that you want to completely disassociate animals with humans .
#Text=IN :
#Text=No , I want to more closely associate humans with the other animals , because if we took Biology 101 we know we are all animals .
#Text=It ’s just that we decide we ’re gods , they ’re trash .
#Text=That ’s just invalid , wrong from every point of perspective : scientific , moral and everything else .
#Text=I want people to relate to the other animals .

#Text=It ’s a matter of discrimination and prejudice to make us decide in the past that disabled people are n’t as important as we are , or somebody ’s skin color was different and we could exploit them .
#Text=Now it ’s that we are n’t the same species so we can treat them like dirt .
#Text=It ’s not logical that we do that , because we are all flesh and blood and feel pain , suffering , joy , love and all those things .
#Text=I think we have to come to terms with the fact that we are all in this life , on this Earth , with lots of other different individuals .
#Text=What was that , The Restaurant at the End of the Universe ?
#Text=DS : Douglas Adams ’ Hitchhiker ’s Guide to the Galaxy ?
#Text=IN :
#Text=Yes ! We go into space and we look for other species and we say we come in peace on the side of the space capsule ... a bunch of hooey !
#Text=If we find them and they are vulnerable , we ’ll experiment on them ; we ’ll taste them and make things out of them .
#Text=We ’ll haul them back here as trinkets and trophies just as we do in Africa or India where we find bears and monkeys we put in the zoo .
#Text=Animals we want to use for decoration .
#Text=We have to come to grips with the fact that we are behaving peculiarly towards the others and they are part of life itself , with us .
#Text=I do n’t want to separate them .
#Text=I want to bring us together !
